eng.greating_msg:
Hello name123.
Welcome to our room booking bot. In order to continue with our bot, first you should provide necessary informations.
To change the language, press /language
eng.proved: You are founded in the database. Now you can use the bot.
eng.lan_change: Please, choose one of the following languages.
eng.lan_change_response: The bot language is changed to English.
eng.room_btn_pressed:
Cool name123.
You have chosen the room #room123.
eng.respon_per: Do you want to take the responsibility of the room? (The person who is responsible for the equipments in the room)
eng.reject_text:
if there is 10 students who wants to use the room, then you will be notified and you can come to the room on time.
Wait for extra informations!!!
eng.accept_msg:
name123, you are in charge of the room. You should come a little bit earlier that day, open the doors, and at the end lock the doors.
Wait for extra informations!!!
eng.next_step:
What do you want to do next?
Please, choose.
eng.notification:
Your request to book the room room123 is approved by an admin.
Please come to the room room123 on time :)
eng.no_accept_notif: Sorry, but your request to book a room room123 is not accepted. If you want, try to book another room :(
eng.no_accept_notif_admin: Rejected and the room history is cleared.
eng.invalid_room_num: Please insert a number only (not text)!!!
eng.insert_time:
Room room123...
Choose a day for the coming week and enter the exta informations.
eng.from_time:
Insert the available time for the room. First, insert only the hour in 0 to 24 format.
From:...

uz.greating_msg:
Assalomu alaykum name123.
Xonani avvaldan band qilish botimizga hush kelibsiz. Botdan foydalanish uchun avval siz kerakli malumotlarni taminlashingiz kerak.
Botni tilini o'zgartirmoqchi bo'sangiz /language ni bosing.
uz.proved: Sizning malumotlaringiz tasdiqlandi. Botdan foydalanishingiz mumkin.
uz.respon_per: Siz xonani javobgarligini o'zingizga olishni istaysizmi? (Xonadagi jihozlarga javobgar shahs)
uz.reject_text:
Agar 10 ta student yig'iladigan bo'lsa, sizga habar beriladi va siz bu xonaga belgilagan vaqtingizda kelishingiz mumkin.
Qo'shimcha malumotlarni kuting!!!
uz.accept_msg:
name123, siz xonaga javobgar shahs deb qabul qilindingiz. Belgilangan kunda, bir oz avvalroq kelib xonani ochish va ohirida yopib ketish sizga yuklatiladi.
Qo'shimcha malumotlarni kuting!!!
uz.next_step:
Nima qilishni hohlaysiz?
Keyingi buyruqni tanlang.
uz.notification: Sizning room123-xonani band qilishga bo'lgan so'rovingiz qabul qilindi, Iltimos o'z vaqtida kelishingizni so'raymiz :)
uz.no_accept_notif: Kechirasiz, sizning room123-xonani band qilishga bo'lgan so'rovingiz qabul qilinmadi, Agar hohlasangiz boshqa xonani band qilishigiz mumkin :(
uz.no_accept_notif_admin: Rad etildi va xonani band qilgan studentlarga bu haqida habar berildi.
uz.insert_time:
room123-Xona
Kelayotgan hafta uchun biror kunni tanlang va qo'shimcha malumotlarni kiriting.
uz.from_time:
Xonani bo'sh boladigan vaqtini faqat soatini kiriting (misol uchun 10 yoki 13).
From:...
